last_episode_to_air.name: My story
last_episode_to_air.overview: Maddie is met with resistance when she tries spinning Cleo’s story.

name: Lady in the Lake
overview: When the disappearance of a young girl grips the city of Baltimore in 1966, the lives of two women converge on a fatal collision course.

episodes.name: Did you know Seahorses are fish?
episodes.overview: Tessie Durst goes missing, sending shockwaves through Baltimore. Cleo and Maddie make life-changing choices. Maddie finds what she feared.

episodes.name: It has to do with the search for the marvelous.
episodes.overview: Maddie takes an interest in the Durst case as she starts a new chapter. Cleo's work for Shell takes a dangerous turn.

episodes.name: I was the first to see her dead. You were the last to see her alive.
episodes.overview: Reeling from what happened under her watch, Cleo begins forming a plan for her safety. Maddie throws herself into the Durst investigation.

episodes.name: Innocence leaves when you discover cruelty. First in others, then in yourself.
episodes.overview: Maddie scores a big interview but struggles to be respected at The Star. Cleo starts implementing her plan as Shell learns troubling information.

episodes.name: Every time someone turns up dead in that lake, it does seem to lead to you.
episodes.overview: Cleo's body is discovered. As Maddie's obsession with Cleo grows deeper, she realizes they once crossed paths.

episodes.name: I know who killed Cleo Johnson
episodes.overview: Arrests, confessions, and connections are made as Maddie comes closer to solving Cleo's murder.

episodes.name: My story
episodes.overview: Maddie is met with resistance when she tries spinning Cleo’s story.
